初遇.encontent:
Greetings to you, fair lady, may I present you a rose?Oh,
 seems like you won't fall for this cheap flattery.
 I'm ashamed.
初遇.content:
向您致意，美丽的女士，请允许我为您献上一枝玫瑰。噢
，看来您不吃这一套，真可惜。

箱中气候.encontent:
Sunlight eases people's mind and endows diamonds with
 glowing luxury. What a perfect occasion for deceiving.
箱中气候.content:
太阳会给人以安全的暗示，也会赋予钻石更为美丽的光华
。而这便是趁虚而入的最好时机。

致未来.encontent:
So what's next? The young lady of the rich, resolute and courageous
 as she is, disregards my humble beginnings and takes her possessions
 to elope with me. But then, I will leave her and disappear,
 forever.
致未来.content:
接下来会怎样？富豪家的千金小姐不介意我的身份地位，痴
心一片地钟情于我，下定决心带着千万财产与我远走高飞
。接着，我将从她身边离去，永远永远，不见踪迹。

孑立.encontent:
A cigar would make a nifty accessory, and those gracious ladies
 would certainly love to see their lover to be a sight for the
 eyes. But ... no, thank you. I'd prefer my teeth unstained.
孑立.content:
雪茄看起来很酷，那些贵妇们也愿意她们的情人看起来风
度翩翩。可是……算了，我可不想染黑自己的牙齿。

问候.encontent:
Good day, my lord. You're too kind visiting me, and
 I regret to receive you in a room of nothing.
问候.content:
贵安，老爷。很遗憾我的房间里什么都没有，让你见笑了
。

朝晨.encontent:
Another beautiful morning arrives, and many beautiful things
 are about to come. I see people opening their arms, waiting
 to go to the ball, new clothes, new flatteries, and new glittering
 stars to come to them.
朝晨.content:
美丽的清晨，许多美丽的事儿。人们等着新舞会，新衣裳
，新的阿谀奉承，和新的、闪烁的、无比迷人的星星落在
自己的手中。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Good morning, my lady. I've prepared you fresh coffee, sandwiches,
 and this shiny diamond. Of course, I would never lie to you,
 this is a piece of cultured work. But look how it sparkles,
 how elegant, isn't it?
信任-朝晨.content:
早安，女士。我为您准备了咖啡，三明治，以及这颗璀璨
的钻石。哦，当然，我不会欺骗您，这是一颗假钻。但它
依旧闪耀夺目，不是吗？

夜暮.encontent:
Would I have the honor to invite you for dinner? There's a banquet
 held by someone I don't know. Huh? A freeloader? No no no, I'd
 say it would be lavish of us if we don't enjoy it.
夜暮.content:
请问您是否愿意赏光，与我共进晚餐？我为您准备了一场
由他人举办的宴会。嗯？吃白食？不不，它有更体面的名
字，叫“物尽其用”。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Ruby Port, a beauty from Douro Valley.Em ... tastes
 as sweet as it smells.Believe me, it will make your
 evening unforgettable.
信任-夜暮.content:
红宝石波特，来自杜罗河谷的美人。嗯～它的味道和它的
颜色一样甜美。相信我，它会让你度过一个美好的夜晚。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
A decent gentleman will not let go of this. But be
 careful, don't let it tilt to your eyes. Eye contact
 is vital.
帽檐与发鬓.content:
一个优雅的绅士少不了这个。不过小心，不要让它挡住你
的视线。眼神交流，非常重要。

袖与手.encontent:
Although I'm not woman of guns, it's necessary to carry
 one. I'm sure you know the reason why.
袖与手.content:
尽管我并不常用手枪解决问题，但它依旧是必须的。想必
您也明白其中的道理。

衣着与身形.encontent:
I don't dislike dresses. They are pretty, delicately embroidered,
 intricately sewed apparels. They are what I'm supposed to wear,
 not these trousers.Heh, destiny holds a different plan, doesn't
 it?
衣着与身形.content:
当然，我并不抵触裙装。它们很漂亮，很复杂，花样多得
迷人眼睛。换句话说，它们才是我本应该穿着的服饰。哼
，真是造化弄人，不是吗？

嗜好.encontent:
Diddling, rightly considered, is a compound of which the ingredients
 are minuteness, interests, perseverance, ingenuity, audacity,
 nonchalance, originality, impertinence, and grin.
嗜好.content:
欺骗是一种繁杂的化合物质，其中包含：敬终慎始、自利
自私、百折不挠、神机妙算、胆大泼天、泰然自若、独具
匠心、肆意妄为——以及，预示着胜利的嗤笑。

赞赏.encontent:
You have every virtue that belongs to a deceiver, yet you're
 a woman of honesty. I don't know if I should admire your righteous
 nature, or lament the waste of gifts.
赞赏.content:
您拥有着骗子应该拥有的一切美德，但您却如此诚实。我
不知道是应该赞扬您，还是应该感叹您如此浪费天赋。

亲昵.encontent:
If you want to, you're always welcome at my place. I will be
 here, with my cleverest scam, waiting for your arrival and,
 of course, an invitation to yours.
亲昵.content:
如果您需要，欢迎随时来拜访我。我与我最精致的骗局永
远在这儿，等待着您的邀请。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
If my eyes serve me well, it's the "Bay of Light" this respectable
 young lady is wearing.Oh, don't worry, I won't do anything.
 She is of a background too prominent and an age too young for
 my tricks.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
如果我没看走眼的话，那位大小姐身上的宝石正是传说中
的“光明海湾”。哦，别担心，我不会对她下手的。她的
来头太大，年纪又太小。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
New Delhi? To be honest, I barely remember anything
 about it. It doesn't make much difference to England,
 aside from the scorching sun.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
新德里？老实说，我几乎都遗忘得差不多了。说到底，除
了毒辣的太阳之外，那里和英国本土并无多大的区别。

独白.encontent:
We are two of a kind, dear.We would employ every means
 possible to find out the truth we crave to know.We
 are very alike.
独白.content:
你跟我是同一类人，我亲爱的，会为了探寻心底期望的真
相而不顾一切，甚至不择手段。我们很相似。

入队.encontent: A crime group? Heh, just to my likings.

战前.encontent: I don't like to resort to violence, but accidents happen.
战前.content: 我并不喜欢用暴力解决问题，但偶尔会有意外。

择选咒语Ⅰ.encontent: Glad to be of service, my lady.

择选高阶咒语.encontent: A design of its own kind.

择选至终的仪式.content: 该从梦中跌落了，绅士们。

释放神秘术Ⅱ.content: 是的，它很坚硬，就像真货。

召唤至终的仪式.encontent:
Fragrance and dazzle can easily confuse one's vision.
 I'm sorry for you.
召唤至终的仪式.content: 香气与闪烁的弧光总会遮挡人的目光，我为你感到遗憾。

战斗胜利.encontent:
Now, to divide the spoils ...  Or should I say, a reasonable
 reallocation of the profits?
战斗胜利.content:
接下来是分赃环节……或者说，对于战利品的合理再分配
。

洞悉.encontent: To its perfection, to its best clarity.
洞悉.content: 越发的完美，越发的闪耀。

洞悉之底.encontent:
Shush, my lady, let us enjoy this moment,this beautiful,
 short, enchanted moment.
洞悉之底.content:
嘘，我的小姐，让我们共享这一刻。这美好，短暂，惹人
迷醉的一刻。
